snippet: Drew Brees smoothly led a touchdown drive on his only series, and the New Orleans Saints beat the Arizona Cardinals, 17-10, in the Hall of Fame game in Canton, Ohio.
abstract: Drew Brees smoothly leads a touchdown drive on his only series, and the New Orleans Saints beat the Arizona Cardinals, 17-10, in the Hall of Fame game in Canton, Ohio.
lead_paragraph: Drew Brees smoothly led a touchdown drive on his only series, and the New Orleans Saints beat the Arizona Cardinals, 17-10, in the Hall of Fame game in Canton, Ohio.

headline.main: Brees Sharp as Saints Beat Cardinals in Hall Game
